name: Lettering #002: Making Progress
description:
"Making tiny progress, day by day"
I made this signage when I felt stuck. I can only made so much progress in a day. This piece is a reminder for myself. That tiny progress is still a progress, and I should stop being so hard on myself.

8 fps | 4000x4000px
25th of August 2021
Using Procreate App on iPad Pro
By Aysa Putri (@aysaptr)
